snippet: The bank and the London Metal Exchange are accused of slowing aluminum deliveries to lift prices.
abstract: London Metal Exchange and Goldman Sachs are named as co-defendants in class-action lawsuit in United States charging anticompetitive behavior in aluminum warehousing; bank and exchange are accused of slowing aluminum deliveries to artificially inflate prices.
lead_paragraph: The bank and the London Metal Exchange are accused of slowing aluminum deliveries to lift prices.

headline.main: Goldman Named in Suit Over Aluminum Supply
headline.print_headline: Goldman and Exchange in Suit Over Aluminum
